title: Further darken border and background of feature pills in hero section

requirements.text: Significantly increase the border darkness and background opacity of the three feature pill elements ('100% Natural Millets', 'Women-Led', 'Farmer Support') in the Hero component to make them much more visible and prominent

quotes: Border and background of this "100% Natural Millets, Women-Led, Farmer Support, make more and more darker

acceptanceCriteria: The border of all three feature pills ('100% Natural Millets', 'Women-Led', 'Farmer Support') is significantly darker than the current implementation
The background opacity of all three feature pills is substantially increased for better visibility
All three pills maintain consistent styling with each other
The pills remain readable and visually distinct against the hero background image
The styling changes apply to both mobile and desktop viewports

constraints: Do not modify the text content of the feature pills
Maintain the existing layout and positioning of the feature pills in the Hero component
Do not change the hero background image
nonGoals: Changing the color scheme of other hero section elements
Modifying the spacing or arrangement of the feature pills
Altering the hero section background image
